cast: 布朗科·比利·安德森 Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson
writer: 布朗科·比利·安德森 Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson
director: 布朗科·比利·安德森 Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson
introduction: A rough criminal gets into an argument over a girl in a dance hall. The argument turns into a fight, and the criminal is shot. As everyone else looks on, a young woman comes to his aid, and it turns out that he is not seriously wounded. He still remembers the woman who helped him when, later, he is committing a burglary and gets a surprise that will change his life.
